prompts: Create a fierce ground-type Pokemon with a muscular build and sharp claws.
Show me a dark-type Pokemon that blends in with its desert surroundings.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a striking red and blue color scheme and a confident stance.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with powerful arms and a menacing expression.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments but has a rugged, wild look.
Give me a Pokemon that excels in combat with its quick reflexes and strong jaws.
Make a Pokemon that has unique features like sunglasses and a crocodile-like body.
